sentences.sentence: The misunderstanding had caused a seven-year estrangement between them.
sentences.translation: 这场误会使得他们七年互不往来。

sentences.sentence: The trip will bring to an end years of estrangement between the two countries.
sentences.translation: 此行将会结束两国多年来的疏远关系。

sentences.sentence: Now that the country has embarked on a return to democracy, Commonwealth heads of government have agreed to end the estrangement.
sentences.translation: 既然该国已开始恢复民主，英联邦政府首脑们已同意结束这种疏远的关系。
